item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @flashy flashy
item.description:
@flashy wrote:

i am the owner and my server im trying to get my npc to say when im offline and online and whedn im online it keeps saying im offline it looks like this my name is ownage jakey

npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Ownage Jakey")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Ownage Jakey is online run for the hillz! hehe!!"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Ownage Jakey is Offline Please Stay Calm!!"; } } }[br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2007, 04:08:12 AM[/size][hr]oh ffs someone help[br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2007, 04:28:02 AM[/size][hr]i need help
